tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Employee { employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_name TEXT, job_title TEXT, department TEXT, hire_date DATE }
CREATE TABLE DisciplinaryAction { action_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT REFERENCES Employee(employee_id), action_date DATE, action_reason TEXT, action_taken TEXT }
CREATE TABLE Grievance { grievance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT REFERENCES Employee(employee_id), grievance_date DATE, grievance_reason TEXT, resolution TEXT }
CREATE TABLE Department { department_id INT PRIMARY KEY, department_name TEXT, location TEXT }
